trend: This is why you feel unmotivated
hook: You were never meant to focus like this.
script:
HOOK (0–3s):
You were never meant to focus like this.

MAIN (3–50s):
Most people don’t realize that this is why you feel unmotivated.
Your brain filters reality to save energy.
That means it deletes details, distorts time,
and prioritizes comfort over truth.
This isn’t a flaw — it’s survival.

CTA (last 5s):
Once you see this, you can’t unsee it.
captions: You were never meant to focus like this.
post_caption: You were never meant to focus like this. #psychology #mind #didyouknow #shorts
